howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Our secure escrow system protects both buyers and sellers throughout the entire transaction
howItWorks.trustMessage: Buy and Sell with Complete Peace of Mind
howItWorks.trustDesc: Your payment is securely held until the ticket is confirmed and the event takes place. Both parties are protected every step of the way.
howItWorks.step1Desc: You securely pay for the ticket. Your payment is held safely in escrow.
howItWorks.step1Note: Money is protected in our secure escrow system
howItWorks.step2Desc: Seller transfers the ticket to you and confirms the transfer in the system.
howItWorks.step2Note: Seller must confirm transfer before payment is released
howItWorks.step3Desc: You confirm receiving the ticket. Funds remain in escrow until event day.
howItWorks.step3Note: Payment held securely until event completion
howItWorks.step4Desc: After the event, you have 3 days to dispute. If no issues, seller gets paid.
howItWorks.paymentProtectionDesc: Your money is held securely until you confirm receipt
howItWorks.disputeWindowDesc: 3 days after the event to report any issues
howItWorks.verifiedTicketsDesc: All tickets are verified before transfer
howItWorks.sellerRatingsDesc: Review seller history and ratings before purchasing
howItWorks.guaranteedPaymentDesc: Payment is secured before ticket transfer
howItWorks.automaticReleaseDesc: Payment automatically released after dispute window
howItWorks.buildReputationDesc: Earn badges and ratings to attract more buyers
howItWorks.faqQ1: When does the seller receive payment?
howItWorks.faqA1: The seller receives payment 3 days after the event date, provided no disputes are filed. This ensures buyers have time to verify the tickets worked properly.
howItWorks.faqQ2: What if I don't receive my ticket?
howItWorks.faqA2: If the seller doesn't transfer the ticket, don't confirm receipt. Contact our support team and your payment will be refunded immediately.
howItWorks.faqQ3: What if the ticket doesn't work at the event?
howItWorks.faqA3: You have 3 days after the event to file a dispute. Our team will investigate and issue a full refund if the ticket was invalid.
howItWorks.faqQ4: How long does the entire process take?
howItWorks.faqA4: Ticket transfers typically happen within 24 hours. Payment is released to sellers 3 days after the event date, assuming no disputes are filed.
howItWorks.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of buyers and sellers who trust our secure platform for their ticket transactions

footer.newsletterSubtitle: Subscribe to get updates on new events

sellerIntro.sellerLevelsDescription: Understand seller levels, requirements, and capabilities.
sellerIntro.level1PaymentLocked: Payouts are locked until identity verification
sellerIntro.level1Note: Identity verification is required to withdraw funds.
sellerIntro.level2PaymentReleased: Funds are released after the event
sellerIntro.level2PaymentWithdraw: Payouts can be withdrawn to your bank account
sellerIntro.importantMessage: All ticket sales are protected by escrow. Sellers are paid only after the event.
sellerIntro.termsContent: By becoming a seller, you agree to list authentic tickets, transfer them promptly to buyers, and follow our platform guidelines. Payments are released after events conclude and verification is complete.
sellerIntro.pleaseAcceptTerms: Please accept the Seller Terms to continue

verification.accountHolderHint: Must match the legal name above
verification.selfieDesc: For faster approval, you can upload a selfie holding your ID
verification.securityMessage: Your information is encrypted and stored securely. We never share your details with buyers.
verification.namesMismatchWarning: The account holder name doesn't match your legal name. This may delay verification. Continue anyway?
verification.verificationSuccess: Verification submitted successfully! You're now a verified seller.
